reviews.review_msg: Sabine is a great prof, she is interesting and was quite helpful in assisting with projects and ideas. I would take another class with her.

Not AT ALL clear what her expectations are.  She doesn't explain the instructions for activities AT ALL - just hands you a piece of paper with vague directions, and then treats you like an idiot when you ask for clarification.  Doesn't give you any idea of how you are doing in class, and most of the projects are kidnergarten level. Waste of money.

WONDERFUL WOMAN!!!  She's very gentle and calm - her feedback is honest and ranks the highest (out of all the feedback I've experienced from SFU profs) in helpfulness and constructiveness.  GREAT TEACHER!!!

Jin-me is defintely a professor everyone needs to encounter in their uni career since she does not put up with lazy thinkers, she forces you to critically re-analyze all of your projects, which I admire. The class itself was lacking but she defintely made up for it in the way your thinking radically changes. Sometimes can be a tad manic though
